articles.title: Emma Heming gushes over husband Bruce Willis, Demi Moore: 'I liked them together' - Page Six
articles.description: The “Ghost” star, 60, and “Die Hard” actor, 68, were married from 1987 to 2000 and share three adult daughters.
articles.content:
Bruce Willis’ current wife really “liked” seeing him with his ex-wife.
